name: JUMP THE GUN (itch)
description:
JUMP THE GUN is a local multiplayer game for 2-4 players. It was originally designed to answer the question: "Do players prefer to shoot one big bullet that deals 3 damage, or three small bullets that each deal 1?"

Players must battle each other to the death, using both bullet types to defeat their enemies and navigate the levels.

NOW WITH BULLET JUMP
Shoot downwards to kick yourself into the air, and combine this with a jump to reach great heights. Shoot upwards to deal with the enemies who fly too close to the sun.

NB: This game requires a controller for each player. (Only tested for Xbox 360 gamepad)

This game is still in development. Please leave a comment if you find any bugs or have any questions or suggestions. All feedback is appreciated.
